description: Core RBAC Security Groups (TASK-001) requires the base Odoo module structure (TASK-005) to be in place.
mitigation_plan: Tasks are assigned to the same developer in the same sprint.
impact_if_delayed: Delays all security and user management setup.

description: The `tms.trip` model (TASK-029) has dependencies on all Master Data models (Vehicle, Driver, Customer, Route, Material) being finalized.
mitigation_plan: All master data models are planned for Sprint 1, while the Trip model is planned for Sprint 2, creating a clear dependency resolution.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the entire Trip Lifecycle Management epic.

description: The Continuous Deployment pipeline (US-102) cannot be implemented until the target infrastructure (EKS cluster from US-100) is provisioned.
mitigation_plan: Infrastructure is scheduled for Sprint 1 and CD for Sprint 3, providing ample time.
impact_if_delayed: Delays automated deployments to staging, slowing down the QA feedback loop.

description: E-Invoicing (US-037) can only be triggered for trips that are completed, which requires the POD upload (US-052) to be functional.
mitigation_plan: POD upload is in Sprint 3, E-Invoicing is in Sprint 5, respecting the workflow dependency.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the entire financial settlement workflow.

description: The Migration Dry-Run (TASK-163) cannot be executed until the migration scripts (TASK-158) and validation scripts (TASK-161) are fully developed and unit tested.
mitigation_plan: All migration-related tasks are planned within the same late-stage sprint (Sprint 7) to ensure focus.
impact_if_delayed: Delays go-live decision and potentially the entire project launch.
